description: Similar to 老登, 老逼灯, 老b灯. Implies someone who doesn't have much time left.

examples.chinese: 老毕登老板,你真的见不到明天的太阳了
examples.translation: Old geezer boss, you really won't see tomorrow's sun

examples.chinese: 没见过这么烦的人,老毕登有多远滚多远
examples.translation: Never seen such an annoying person, old geezer get lost
